com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.server.cdo

Class CDOBranchActionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.server.cdo.CDOBranchActionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICDOBranchActionManager

    public class CDOBranchActionManager
extends Object
implements ICDOBranchActionManager
    Application service class responsible for handling branch operations, eg. creation, synchronization and promotion of changes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getLastCommitTime(String repositoryUuid, IBranchPath branchPath)
      Returns with the last commit time made on the given branch.
      boolean isSynchronized(IBranchPathMap branchPathMap)
      Checks whether any of the branches specified by their paths should be synchronized with the corresponding parent branch.
      Throwable prepare(IBranchPathMap branchPathMap, String userId)
      Initializes infrastructure of the underlying lightweight stores for the specified set of branches.
      Throwable promote(IBranchPathMap branchPathMap, String userId, String commitComment)
      Promotes changes made on any of the specified branches to their corresponding parent branch, typically at the end of an authoring task.
      Throwable revert(IBranchPoint branchPoint, String userId)
      Reverts all modifications on the specified branch made between the HEAD of the given branch and the corresponding branch point timestamp.
      Throwable revertAllChangesOnBranch(IBranchPath branchPath, String userId, String commitComment, String repositoryUuid)
      Reverts all changes on a given branch identified by the unique branch path in all specified repositories.
      Throwable revertAllChangesOnBranchWithContext(IBranchPath branchPath, String userId, String commitComment, String repositoryUuid, String parentContextDescription)
      Reverts all changes on a given branch identified by the unique branch path in all specified repositories.
      Throwable synchronize(IBranchPathMap branchPathMap, String userId, String commitComment)
      Synchronizes the specified set of branches with their corresponding parent branches; after synchronization completes, all changes that have happened on the parent branches since the last synchronization will be added to the task branches, and all changes that have happened on the task branches will be preserved as much as possible.

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        @Nullable
public Throwable prepare(IBranchPathMap branchPathMap,
                                    String userId)
        Description copied from interface: ICDOBranchActionManager
        Initializes infrastructure of the underlying lightweight stores for the specified set of branches.
        Specified by:
        prepare in interface ICDOBranchActionManager
        Parameters:
        branchPathMap - the destination branch path map indicating the set of branches to change to.
        userId - the unique ID of the user performing the branch change.
        Returns:
        returns with the error (if any) occurred while performing the branch switching. Returns with null if the operation was successful.

      • synchronize

        @Nullable
public Throwable synchronize(IBranchPathMap branchPathMap,
                                        String userId,
                                        String commitComment)
        Description copied from interface: ICDOBranchActionManager
        Synchronizes the specified set of branches with their corresponding parent branches; after synchronization completes, all changes that have happened on the parent branches since the last synchronization will be added to the task branches, and all changes that have happened on the task branches will be preserved as much as possible.
        Specified by:
        synchronize in interface ICDOBranchActionManager
        Parameters:
        branchPathMap - the set of branch paths to synchronize.
        userId - the unique ID of the user who's performing the branch synchronization.
        commitComment - the commit comment for the synchronization.
        Returns:
        returns with the error (if any) occurred while performing the branch synchronization. Returns with null if the operation was successful.
        See Also:
        - occurres if the synchronization failed with conflicts

      • promote

        @Nullable
public Throwable promote(IBranchPathMap branchPathMap,
                                    String userId,
                                    String commitComment)
        Description copied from interface: ICDOBranchActionManager
        Promotes changes made on any of the specified branches to their corresponding parent branch, typically at the end of an authoring task.
        Specified by:
        promote in interface ICDOBranchActionManager
        Parameters:
        branchPathMap - the set of branch paths to promote, keyed by repository UUID.
        userId - the unique ID of the user performing the promotion.
        commitComment - the commit comment for the promotion.
        Returns:
        returns with the error (if any) occurred while promoting changes to the parent branch. Returns with null if the operation was successful.

      • isSynchronized

        public boolean isSynchronized(IBranchPathMap branchPathMap)
        Description copied from interface: ICDOBranchActionManager
        Checks whether any of the branches specified by their paths should be synchronized with the corresponding parent branch.

        This method gets the base of the current branch and checks if there any changes on the parent branch with the current branch's timestamp and the HEAD of the parent branch.

        Specified by:
        isSynchronized in interface ICDOBranchActionManager
        Parameters:
        branchPathMap - the set of branch paths to check, keyed by repository UUID.
        Returns:
        returns true if all branches are synchronized with their corresponding parent branch. Otherwise returns with false.

      • getLastCommitTime

        public long getLastCommitTime(String repositoryUuid,
                              IBranchPath branchPath)
        Description copied from interface: ICDOBranchActionManager
        Returns with the last commit time made on the given branch.
        This method will return with Long.MIN_VALUE if no modification has been made on the given branch, hence no commit time is associated with it.
        Specified by:
        getLastCommitTime in interface ICDOBranchActionManager
        Parameters:
        repositoryUuid - the unique ID of the repository to check for last modification.
        branchPath - the branch path.
        Returns:
        the timestamp for the last modification made on the given branch or Long.MIN_VALUE if no modifications have been made on the given branch yet.

      • revert

        @Nullable
public Throwable revert(IBranchPoint branchPoint,
                                   String userId)
        Description copied from interface: ICDOBranchActionManager
        Reverts all modifications on the specified branch made between the HEAD of the given branch and the corresponding branch point timestamp.

        Essentially this creates and inverse change set between the HEAD and a branch point given as the target time stamp and applies the inverse change set on the HEAD.

        Specified by:
        revert in interface ICDOBranchActionManager
        Parameters:
        branchPoint - the branch point to revert to the repository state.
        userId - the unique ID of the user who's performing the revert operation.
        Returns:
        exception indicating the reason why the operation failed. May return with null if the operation was successful.

      • revertAllChangesOnBranch

        public Throwable revertAllChangesOnBranch(IBranchPath branchPath,
                                          String userId,
                                          @Nullable
                                          String commitComment,
                                          String repositoryUuid)
        Description copied from interface: ICDOBranchActionManager
        Reverts all changes on a given branch identified by the unique branch path in all specified repositories.
        Specified by:
        revertAllChangesOnBranch in interface ICDOBranchActionManager
        Parameters:
        branchPath - the path of the branch to revert all changes.
        userId - the user ID.
        commitComment - commit comment for the revert. Optional, can be null.
        repositoryUuid - the unique repository ID.
        Returns:
        with null if the revert was successful, otherwise returns with a Throwable indicating the cause of the failure.

      • revertAllChangesOnBranchWithContext

        public Throwable revertAllChangesOnBranchWithContext(IBranchPath branchPath,
                                                     String userId,
                                                     @Nullable
                                                     String commitComment,
                                                     String repositoryUuid,
                                                     String parentContextDescription)
        Description copied from interface: ICDOBranchActionManager
        Reverts all changes on a given branch identified by the unique branch path in all specified repositories.
        Specified by:
        revertAllChangesOnBranchWithContext in interface ICDOBranchActionManager
        Parameters:
        branchPath - the path of the branch to revert all changes.
        userId - the user ID.
        commitComment - commit comment for the revert. Optional, can be null.
        repositoryUuid - the unique repository ID.
        parentContextDescription - the parent lock context description
        Returns:
        with null if the revert was successful, otherwise returns with a Throwable indicating the cause of the failure.
